main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported in Attica, Indiana, on July 6, 1969, including observations of a 'Viau' UFO at different elevations.
interesting points: The first sighting of the 'Viau' UFO was at 2000 hours with a 150° elevation,The second sighting occurred at 2115 hours with a 50° elevation, Other unidentified objects were noted to have a stellar magnitude of +0.2±, A witness described seeing a bright star-like object change colors from red, white, to green, Multiple witnesses, including a family, observed the changing lights over approximately 1 hour and 15 minutes.
sighted object: Viau UFO and unidentified aerial phenomena
witness description: A family including 7 children and their parents, a foreman with extensive travel experience.
